column1: Reposing will be held on Wednesday June 24th
column2: from 8:30am-10:00am at the Cornell Funeral Home 247 White Street
column4: CT. A Mass of Christian Burial will be celebrated on Wednesday at 10:30am will take place at St Edward the Confessor Church 21 Brush Hill Road
column6: CT. Burial will follow at Mountain View Cemetery New Fairfield.
